00250   Pid &operator =(const Pid& p)
00251   {
00252     if (this == &p)
00253       return *this;
00254 
00255     p_gain_ = p.p_gain_;
00256     i_gain_ = p.i_gain_;
00257     d_gain_ = p.d_gain_;
00258     i_max_ = p.i_max_;
00259     i_min_ = p.i_min_;
00260 
00261     p_error_last_ = p_error_ = i_term_ = d_error_ = cmd_ = 0.0;
00262     return *this;
00263   }
00264
